Interface ISeria

Interface for a serialization service.

Namespace: Mewdeko.Common.PubSub
Assembly: Mewdeko.dll
Syntax
public interface ISeria

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

Deserialize<T>(byte[])

Deserializes the given byte array into an object of type T.

Declaration
T? Deserialize<T>(byte[] data)
Parameters
Type Name Description
byte[] data

The byte array to deserialize.
Returns
Type Description
T

An object of type T representing the deserialized data, or null if deserialization fails.
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

The type of object to deserialize into.

Serialize<T>(T)

Serializes the given data into a byte array.

Declaration
byte[] Serialize<T>(T data)
Parameters
Type Name Description
T data

The data to serialize.
Returns
Type Description
byte[]

A byte array representing the serialized data.
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

The type of data to serialize.
